dcterms:creator: L. Cheng
B. Li
Q. Yu
W. Lu
L. Si
dcterms:description: A comprehensive corpus focused on long-distance relationships between statements, including both argument mining (AM) and argument pair extraction (APE). It contains 4,764 pairs of review and rebuttal passages related to scientific article submissions, with each passage being sentence-separated and including multiple arguments.
dcterms:title: Review-Rebuttal Submission-v2 (RRv2)
